email_chain.subject: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Dear James,

I hope this email finds you well.

We are pleased to offer mv SEA HORIZON for your 12,000MT steel coils shipment from Rotterdam to Houston.
Rate: USD 78/MT, CFR basis.
Laycan: 15-20 October 2023.
NYPE terms with demurrage at USD 12,000/day.

Looking forward to your feedback.

Best regards,
Laura Martinez
Ocean Cargo Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thanks for the offer. USD 78/MT seems a bit high compared to current market rates. Can you revise to USD 72/MT?

Also, could you confirm the vessel's DWT and LOA?

Best regards,
James Wilson
SteelCo

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Dear James,

Thank you for your prompt response.

I can offer USD 75/MT, which is our best rate given the current market conditions. The vessel SEA HORIZON has a DWT of 85,000 and LOA of 230m.

Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Laura,

USD 75/MT is still higher than we'd like. If you can stretch the laycan to 18-23 October, could you come down to USD 73/MT?

Regards,
James

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
James,

I can agree to USD 73/MT with the revised laycan of 18-23 October. Please confirm your acceptance, and I will send over the recap.

Best regards,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Laura,

USD 73/MT works for us. Please proceed with the recap.

Thanks,
James

email_chain.subject: Confirmed: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
James,

Thank you for your confirmation. Recap attached below:

Commodity: Steel Coils
Quantity: 12,000 MT
Load Port: Rotterdam
Discharge Port: Houston
Incoterms: CFR
Vessel: SEA HORIZON
Freight: USD 73/MT
Laycan: 18-23 October 2023
Demurrage: USD 12,000/day

Best regards,
Laura Martinez
Ocean Cargo Brokers
